item.description:
@bluur3 wrote:

I’m trying to fix this, when you are poisoned by an NPC there is a message that says “You have been poisoned”

public void appendPoison(int damage) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastPoisonSip > c.poisonImmune) { c.sendMessage("You have been poisoned."); c.poisonDamage = damage; } }

The thing is, this happens every time the NPC hits you for a poison attack, so in the fight your chat just spams “You ahve been poisoned” over and over

I’m trying to figure out how to make it so it only sends the message when you arent poisoned
